Draft definition: Name of the sponsoring Government department
Maps to: Project Level: Add an entry to ``parties`` with 'owner' included in its ``.roles``.

Draft definition: Develop a list of sectors relevant to country e.g. housing, transport, energy, water etc.
Maps to: Project Level: Publish as ``sector``, with additional sectors in ``additionalClassifications``.

Draft definition: Develop a subset for each sector e.g. Transport could be subdivided into national highway, local road, railway, port, airport etc.
Specify the project name
Briefly specify location of the project
Maps to: Project Level: Publish using the ``location`` fields as an address, geometry (point/line/polygon) or gazetter entry.

Draft definition: Specify the socio economic purpose of the project
Concise description and details of the project
Main outputs from the project that are being taken forward into construction (type, quantity, unit)
Maps to: Project Level: Publish in ``documents``, with ``.type`` set to 'scope' and include a short description and/or a link to a document providing details.

Draft definition: Briefly describe the environmental impacts and mitigation measures for this project e.g. impacts on flora, fauna & woodlands, areas of natural beauty, carbon emissions etc. and mitigation measures e.g. pollution control, low carbon solutions, sustainable timber etc.
Maps to: Project Level: Publish in ``documents``, with ``.type`` set to 'environmentalImpact' and include a short description and/or a link to a document providing details.

Draft definition: State the amount of land and property that was acquired for the project e.g. 25km2 land, and related impacts e.g. archaeological issues (moved saxon burial site), local/indigenous settlements (relocated 5 indigenous villages of 500 villagers each), impacts on local businesses e.g. (30 business properties purchased).
Maps to: Project Level: Publish in ``documents``, with ``.type`` set to 'landAndSettlementImpact' and include a short description and/or a link to a document providing details.

Draft definition: Postal and electronic address of the Project Owner
Maps to: Project Level: Include ``.address`` and ``.contactPoint`` information for the Party with the 'owner' in ``.roles``.

Draft definition: Name the funding organisation(s)/sources of funding
Maps to: Project Level: Include each of the funding organisations in the ``parties`` array with 'funder' in ``.roles``. When information on the amount provided by each funder is available, use ``budget/budgetBreakdown`` to provide details.

Draft definition: Specify the projected costs/allocated budget for the project (currency and amount). The budget includes land / property acquisition, environmental mitigation measures, H&S provisions, client, consultant & contractor costs, VAT etc.
Date project budget was authorised
Maps to: Projet Level: Publish as ``budget/approvalDate`` and include additional document with ``.type`` of 'budgetApproval' if required

Draft definition: The current stage of the project. Select from identification, preparation, construction or completed

State projected or actual completion cost
(currency and amount)
State projected or actual completion date
Indicate projected or actual scope of project. Aim is to show if the completed project scope differs from the original project scope. Specify main outputs (type, quantity, unit)
Maps to: ProjectLevel: Publish free text as ``completion/finalScopeDetails`` and/or include document with ``.type`` of ``scope`` and dates and descriptions that show this is final scope at completion.

Draft definition: Summary of primary reasons for any changes in scope, time and cost

CoST IDS Element: Reference to audit and evaluation reports
Draft definition: Reference to publicly available technical and financial audits
Maps to: Project Level: Publish in ``documents``, with ``.type`` set to 'finalAudit' and include a short description and/or a link to a document providing details.
